io.name: SCISCDZE0010301_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:SCISCDZE0010301_inbound" /> <complexType name="SCISCDZE0010301_inbound"> <sequence> <element name="jsondata"> <annotation> <documentation>JSON데이터</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="P" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="120" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="secrKey"> <annotation> <documentation>인증키</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="20" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="key"> <annotation> <documentation>API 명</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="16" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="charSet"> <annotation> <documentation>캐릭터셋</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="20" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="reqDataRowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>개벌입력부_배열건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="reqDataList" type="tns:REQ_DATA_LIST_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>개벌입력부_배열</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="REQ_DATA_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="REQ_DATA_LIST_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="bankCd"> <annotation> <documentation>은행코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="3" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="searchAcctNo"> <annotation> <documentation>조회계좌번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="20" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="acnmNo"> <annotation> <documentation>사업자번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="10" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="icheAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>이체금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="15" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="trscSeqNo"> <annotation> <documentation>거래일련번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="7" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

io.name: SCISCDZE0010301_OUTBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:SCISCDZE0010301_outbound" /> <complexType name="SCISCDZE0010301_outbound"> <sequence> <element name="rsltCd"> <annotation> <documentation>처리결과코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> </simpleType> </element> <element name="rsltMg"> <annotation> <documentation>결과메시지</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="40" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="respData" type="tns:RESP_DATA_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>응답DATA</documentation> <appinfo> <p:level value="1" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="RESP_DATA_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="acctNm"> <annotation> <documentation>예금주명</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="20" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="trscSeqNo"> <annotation> <documentation>거래일련번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="7" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
